subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The freshman Grayson Allen, who won the slam dunk contest at the McDonald’s all-American game a year ago by dunking over Jahlil Okafor, can surprise opponents if they are not careful.
snippet: The freshman Grayson Allen, who won the slam dunk contest at the McDonald’s all-American game a year ago by dunking over Jahlil Okafor, can surprise opponents if they are not careful.
